column1: #Text=Meelo says : " You call yourself an airbender ?
#Text=" Daw says : " But , I do n't even know what that means .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Now , that man is a leaf .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " A student is only as good as his master .
#Text=I just got a message from Tenzin .
#Text=He 's with a whole group of other airbenders at the Northern Temple and he wants all of you to join them .
#Text=We leave first thing in the morning .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " And the Avatar is with him ?
#Text=Apparently she had to split off from Tenzin .
#Text=I was really looking forward to meeting her .
